name: Bugs Bunny
description: A clever, laid-back rabbit famous for his catchphrase 'Eh, what’s up, doc?' and his ability to outsmart his rivals.

name: Daffy Duck
description: A zany black duck with a lisp and a big ego. Often jealous of Bugs Bunny and known for his chaotic antics.

name: Porky Pig
description: A kind-hearted pig with a stutter, known for closing classic cartoons with his signature line 'Th-th-th-that’s all folks!'

name: Tweety
description: A small, yellow canary with an innocent appearance but a sharp wit, constantly pursued by Sylvester the Cat.
quote: I tawt I taw a puddy tat!

name: Sylvester
description: A black-and-white cat obsessed with catching Tweety. Famous for his lisp and the exclamation 'Sufferin’ succotash!'

name: Elmer Fudd
description: A bald, soft-spoken hunter with a speech impediment, best known for hunting 'wabbits' and being outsmarted by Bugs Bunny.
quote: Shhh... be vewy vewy quiet, I'm hunting wabbits.

name: Road Runner
description: A super-fast blue bird that constantly escapes Wile E. Coyote’s elaborate traps, known for his signature 'Meep meep!'

name: Wile E. Coyote
description: A determined but unlucky coyote who endlessly pursues the Road Runner using complex contraptions from ACME Corporation.
quote: (silent, except for signs and rare grunts)

name: Yosemite Sam
description: A short-tempered cowboy with a fiery red mustache, often portrayed as Bugs Bunny’s loud and explosive rival.
quote: I’m the roughest, toughest, he-man stuffest hombre that ever crossed the Rio Grande!

name: Tasmanian Devil
description: A whirlwind of energy and appetite from Tasmania, famous for his growls and spinning tornado-like attacks.

name: Lola Bunny
description: A confident and athletic female rabbit introduced in Space Jam. Known for her basketball skills and cool-headed personality.

name: Marvin the Martian
description: A soft-spoken Martian villain who plans to destroy Earth because it obstructs his view of Venus. Known for his Roman-style helmet and ray gun.
quote: Where’s the kaboom? There was supposed to be an Earth-shattering kaboom!

name: Speedy Gonzales
description: A super-fast Mexican mouse known as 'The fastest mouse in all Mexico', always outsmarting cats to help his friends.

name: Foghorn Leghorn
description: A loud, talkative rooster with a southern accent, often involved in slapstick conflicts on the farm.
quote: I say, I say, boy, you’re about as sharp as a bowling ball!

name: Granny
description: A sweet old lady who owns Tweety and often scolds Sylvester for his mischief.
quote: Now, now, Sylvester, you leave that poor little bird alone!

name: Pepé Le Pew
description: A romantic skunk with a strong French accent, constantly chasing after Penelope Pussycat, mistaking her for a fellow skunk.
quote: Ah, my little darling, it is love at first sight, is it not?

name: Tasmanian She-Devil
description: The female counterpart of the Tasmanian Devil, equally wild and ferocious, but with a sassy edge.
quote: Rrrawr! Nobody messes with my Taz!

name: Mickey Mouse
description: The cheerful and optimistic mouse who became the mascot of Disney. Known for his red shorts, yellow shoes, and gloves.
quote: Gosh, Minnie, you've always been a princess to me.

name: Minnie Mouse
description: Mickey's sweet and fashionable girlfriend, known for her polka-dot dress and bows.

name: Donald Duck
description: A temperamental but lovable duck with a distinctive voice, known for his sailor outfit and short temper.

name: Goofy
description: A tall, dog-like character known for his clumsy, good-natured personality and signature laugh.

name: Pluto
description: Mickey's loyal pet dog, non-verbal, playful, and often getting into comic mishaps.

name: Roger Rabbit
description: A zany, energetic rabbit who gets into wild adventures and is always trying to clear his name.

name: Jessica Rabbit
description: Roger Rabbit's glamorous wife, famous for her sultry voice and sparkling red dress.
quote: I'm not bad, I'm just drawn that way.

name: Huey Duck
description: One of Donald Duck's nephews, wearing a red shirt and cap, clever and mischievous.

name: Dewey Duck
description: One of Donald Duck's nephews, wearing a blue shirt and cap, adventurous and curious.

name: Louie Duck
description: The third of Donald Duck's nephews, wearing a green shirt and cap, often a bit more laid-back.

name: Scrooge McDuck
description: Donald Duck's wealthy uncle, famous for his adventurous spirit, huge fortune, and signature top hat and cane.

name: Daisy Duck
description: Donald Duck's sophisticated girlfriend, stylish and confident, often acting as his voice of reason.

name: Tom
description: A grey domestic cat, clever but often outwitted by Jerry. Known for his persistent attempts to catch the mouse.

name: Jerry
description: A small, brown mouse who is clever, mischievous, and always manages to escape Tom's schemes.

name: Betty Boop
description: A flapper girl character famous for her flirtatious personality, big eyes, and iconic 'Boop-Oop-a-Doop' catchphrase. One of the most recognizable cartoon icons of the 1930s.

name: Popeye
description: A spinach-loving sailor with bulging forearms, known for his strength, squinty eye, and heroic antics. Famous for saving Olive Oyl from danger.

name: Olive Oyl
description: A tall, slender woman and Popeye’s love interest. Known for her kind heart, patience, and occasional adventurous spirit.

name: Woody Woodpecker
description: A mischievous red-headed woodpecker known for his laugh and playful pranks. Famous for always outsmarting his rivals.

name: Oswald the Lucky Rabbit
description: An early cartoon character created by Walt Disney, a clever and adventurous rabbit known for his mischievous antics and cheerful personality.
quote: (mostly silent, uses expressive actions and gestures)

name: Chilly Willy
description: A small, cute penguin from the Walter Lantz cartoons, known for his cleverness and love for staying warm in cold climates.
quote: (mostly silent, communicates with gestures and expressions)

name: Chip
description: The smarter and more serious of the chipmunk duo. Recognizable by his small black nose and prominent front teeth. Always scheming with Dale to get what they want.

name: Dale
description: The goofy and fun-loving chipmunk of the duo, with a red nose and gap between his teeth. Often the more carefree partner in mischief with Chip.

name: Droopy
description: A small, slow-speaking dog with a droopy face and a deadpan personality. Known for outsmarting his adversaries despite appearing lethargic.

name: Pink Panther
description: A clever, silent, and cool pink panther known for his smooth antics and mischievous behavior. Often gets into comedic situations without saying a word.

name: Wolf
description: A lustful, energetic wolf known for his exaggerated expressions and comical pursuit of the female characters, especially Red from Red Hot Riding Hood. Famous for his wild reactions and over-the-top antics.
quote: (mostly silent, expresses desire and surprise with exaggerated gestures and sounds)

name: Screwy Squirrel
description: An anthropomorphic squirrel created by Tex Avery for Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, generally considered the wackiest of the screwball cartoon characters of the 1940s
quote: (silent in most adaptations, acts through gestures and heroic deeds)

name: Red
description: A glamorous, confident female character who captivates the Wolf with her charm. Known for her singing, dancing, and bold personality in Tex Avery’s exaggerated, comedic style.
quote: (mostly silent, expresses personality through gestures, singing, and dancing)

name: Felix the Cat
description: A clever and mischievous black cat known for his magical bag of tricks and adventurous personality. One of the earliest and most iconic cartoon characters.
quote: (mostly silent, uses gestures and his bag of tricks to communicate)

name: Droopy
description: Un petit chien qui parle lentement, avec un visage tombant et une personnalité impassible. Connu pour déjouer ses adversaires malgré son apparence léthargique.

name: La Panthère rose
description: Une panthère rose intelligente, silencieuse et cool, connue pour ses astuces malicieuses et son comportement espiègle. Souvent impliquée dans des situations comiques sans prononcer un mot.

name: Le Loup
description: Un loup lubrique et énergique, connu pour ses expressions exagérées et sa poursuite comique des personnages féminins, notamment Rouge. Célèbre pour ses réactions sauvages et ses pitreries extrêmes.
quote: (principalement silencieux, exprime désir et surprise par gestes et sons exagérés)

name: Casse-noisette
description: Un écureuil anthropomorphe créé par Tex Avery pour Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, considéré comme le plus farfelu des personnages cartoons des années 1940.
quote: (principalement silencieux, agit par gestes et actions héroïques)

name: Red
description: Une femme glamour et confiante, qui charme le Loup par son charisme. Connue pour son chant, sa danse et sa personnalité audacieuse dans le style exagéré et comique de Tex Avery.
quote: (principalement silencieuse, exprime sa personnalité par gestes, chant et danse)

name: Félix le chat
description: Un chat noir malin et espiègle, connu pour son sac magique et sa personnalité aventureuse. L’un des premiers et des plus emblématiques personnages de dessins animés.
quote: (principalement silencieux, utilise gestes et son sac magique pour communiquer)
